info.title: Voyages
info.description:
Get operational details over voyages (service, vessel, calls, schedule, cutoff) operated by all carriers of the group. </br>
Given a voyage this API returns operational data like shipping company, vessel, calls & terminals, operational dates (berth, unberth, standard & special booking acceptance/ port/vgm/SI/customs cut-offs,â€¦).

get.description:
Search voyages on a date period by _(exclusive)_:  
 * Service
 * Line

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: use `voyageFirstCall` to search voyages with first call within the period. use `voyageAnyCall` to search voyages with any calls within the period

parameters.name: shipcomp
parameters.description:
Shipping company, e.g. `0001`, `0002`...
 Default value is 0001
 See referential.shipping.company.v1 API

parameters.name: serviceCode
parameters.description:
Service code
Either a main code or a carrier code, maximum, 20 services codes

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorting rules, csv of `[parameter]:{asc|desc}` default `asc`, asc is optional
example : "code,startPointCode:desc"
available sorting attribute : `code`, `startPointCode`, `startPoolCode`, `service.code`,`startDate`,`vessel.code`

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Pagination parameter. default 0-49. Maximum rows to return 50

253.description: Successful Operation but enrichment is missing due to subsystem unavailability

416.description:
hereunder fault datatype description
 Reason - 416 Range Not Satisfiable
 Code - CAL_ERR Description - No call found for range

500.description:
hereunder fault datatype description
 Reason - 500 Internal error
 Code - VOY_ERR Description - Voyage service unavailable

get.description:
Load previous voyage for the same service.

Inside a service, voyages are ordered by rotation.
 Previous voyage is the previous in the same rotation or then the last of the previous rotation.

253.description: Successful Operation but enrichment is missing due to subsystem unavailability

 Code - VOY_ERR Description - Voyage service unavailable

get.description:
Load next voyage for the same service.

Inside a service, voyages are ordered by rotation.
 Next voyage is the next in the same rotation or then the first of the next rotation.

get.description:
Get current vessel commercial calls.
 Retrieved calls are:
  *  7 passed,
  *  1 current,
  *  7 future

get.summary: Search commercial calls on a date range by filters port code or country code'
get.description:
## Search commercial calls on a date period by _(exclusive)_:  
 * Country code
 * Port code
 * Terminal code
 
**One and only one criterion is required and allowed.**
*Additional criteria are also available on*
 * Vessel IMO
 * Voyage code
 * Service code

 
 ## Alternate search from a list of callID
 Only callId parameter is allowed

parameters.name: dateType
parameters.description:
the date used to filter, by default `berth`
allowed values : 
`berth` to filter between berth and unberth - vessel berthed during provided period
`seaPassage` to filter between EOSP and SOSP - vessel on port during provided period
`eosp` to filter  on EOSP - EOSP in in the provided period

parameters.name: shipcomp
parameters.description:
Shipping company, e.g. `0001`, `0002`...
 Default value is 0001
 See referential.shipping.company.v1 API

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorting rules, csv of `[parameter]:{asc|desc}` default `asc`, asc is optional
example : "code,startPointCode:desc"
available sorting attribute : `voyageCode`, `location.internalCode`, `location.facility.internalCode`, `service.code`,`eospDate`,`berthDate`,`unberthDate`,`vessel.code`

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Pagination parameter. default 0-49. Maximum rows to return 50

253.description: Successful Operation but enrichment is missing due to subsystem unavailability

shippingCompany.description:
shipping company code of the voyage,
 such as `0001`, `0002`, etc

previousVoyage.description: previous voyage code for the vessel

nextVoyage.description: next voyage code for the vessel

statusCode.description: to communicate any change / exception to the published schedule. This is not required in case of normal schedule - set to BLNK for Blank sailing

name.description: English description as per provider's referential (e.g. Marseille)

codificationType.description: type of codification such as UN/Locode, GLN, Coordinate

codification.description: value related to the codification, if codification is UN/Locode, value will be location UN Locode value

facilityType.description: facitity type such as Terminal, client, depot, ...

codificationType.description: type of codification such as SMDG, Address, Coordinate

codification.description: value related to the codification, if codification is SMDG, value will be facility SMDG value

type.description:
call type:
 * `Call`: basic call,
 * `Omit`: call is scheduled but not performed,
 * `Canal`: canal or passage

shippingCompany.description:
shipping company code of the voyage,
 such as `0001`, `0002`, etc

previousVoyage.description: previous voyage code for the vessel

nextVoyage.description: next voyage code for the vessel

code.example: !!DEPRECATED!! Location object should be used instead

name.example: !!DEPRECATED!! Location object should be used instead

smdgLinerCode.description: SMDG Liner code as per SMDG referential https://smdg.org

reason.description: HTTP error or Free text such as Database Not Available, Invalid Credential, Mandatory, Invalid Format,  Invalid Length, ForbiddenValue, Invalid Data,...

code.description: Error Id,  Server Application error ID, Oracle error Id, ...

description.description: Human-readable error description including Data and Value
